name: ArtofWar
0:
”Alexa ask Art of War for a random quote”
”Open Chapter 4 verse 3”
”Read Variation in Tactics”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art of war
des: Tired of skills that just have a few quotes from the "Art of War"? Here is your solution. You can ask Alexa to read any of the 13 chapters. If you have a specific quote that you like, you can ask for a specific chapter and verse. If you are just in the mood for a random quote, you can have that too. You have access to ALL of the "Art of War".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
